readable.title: 1329832826_432538d331
readable.content: People stand on a street corner at dusk , with a pharmacy in the background . People stand outside of the Rite Aid pharmacy on Broadway . People waiting to cross the street in front of a pharmacy with lit up sign . Some people look to cross the street in front of a drug store . This is a picture of a Broadway Rite Aid Pharmacy that has a bright neon sign and people are prepared to cross the street in front of it .
